<h2>Who are we?</h2>

Hello! HostWithLinux is a UK based VPS and webhosting provider, and have been offering services since 2012. We have live chat, ticket and QQ support (2096730936).

Our latest offer is based out of ColoCrossing's  Los Angeles location, with the test IP [198.23.130.6](http://lg.la.colocrossing.com), and using tunneled IPv6 from QuickPacket with a test IPv6 of 2607:3f00:11::1 (add +10ms delay over the tunnel). We use enterprise grade HDD's in hardware RAID10 for this plan, with a mix of new and old Xeon's as well as a full duplex 1Gbps connection per node.

By default we block outgoing SMTP on port 25, however this block can be removed with a support ticket and does not effect incoming mail.

**LA LET-3GBm @ $2 a month - [Click HERE to order](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/order.php?step=1&productGroup=26&product=101)**

* 3GB RAM
